message.body: Are you in Swarthmore. Soraya wants to say hi
Another time:)!! Did she decide where she wants to go?
Not yet but it looks like McGill...will you be there tomorrow around 1 or 4? She takes a class at Swarthmore on Wednesdays... She wants to thank you

I'll be there until 5 pm. She can come any time and I'll be very happy to see her and know more about her decision process. I am happy she is considering McGill. It is a great university in a wonderful country where she'll learn a lot about diversity!
